docs.text: GLocalFlexTrade Public API ¶ Public client API for the flexible energy trading market GLocalFlex. Trade energy or offer flexible loads to the European energy market. Install Python package pip install flxtrd Import in to your trading client import flxtrd You can use a sample trading client from the command line for testing python -m flxtrd --help
docs.title: Home
